attributes.value: Only rarely feels strong cravings or urges
Feels best when everyone gets along without any strife or contention
Is very polite and observes appropriate rules of decorum when possible
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Tries to do things correctly each time
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Sees others as selfish and conniving
Lives at a slow-going and leisurely pace
Likes a little excitement now and then
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
